import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import {Link,withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import {addEducation} from '../../actions.js/profile' const AddEducation = ({addEducation,history}) => { const [formData,setFormdData] = useState({ school : '', degree:'', fieldofstudy:'', from:'', to:'', current:false, description:'' }) const [toDateDisabled,toggleDisabled] = useState(false) const {school,degree,fieldofstudy,from,to,current,description} = formData const onChange = e => { setFormdData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit= e => { e.preventDefault(); addEducation(formData,history) } return (

Add Your Education

Add any Degree or Certification

* = required field
onSubmit(e)}>
onChange(e)} required />
onChange(e)} required />
onChange(e)} />

From Date

onChange(e)} />

{setFormdData({...formData,current:!current}) toggleDisabled(!toDateDisabled)}} /> Currently Studying

To Date

onChange(e)} disabled={toDateDisabled ? 'disabled' : ''} />
Go Back
); } export default connect(null,{addEducation})(withRouter(AddEducation))
